doc.name: help
doc.summary: Sent when the user presses the Help or F1 key.

examples.example:
on help
if the environment is "development"
then pass help
else go stack "My Help Tips"
end help

description.p: Handle the help message in order to substitute custom help for the LiveCode help system, or to provide help in a standalone application.
The message is sent to the active (focused) control, or to the current card if no control is focused.
